mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_card_tb (company_id, card_name, card_number_encrypted, card_last_four, is_active, created_by, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{cardName}, #{cardNumberEncrypted}, #{cardLastFour}, COALESCE(#{isActive}, 1), #{createdBy}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT cc.*, u.korean_name AS created_by_name, c.company_name AS company_name FROM company_card_tb cc LEFT JOIN user_tb u ON cc.created_by = u.user_id LEFT JOIN company_tb c ON cc.company_id = c.company_id WHERE cc.card_id = #{cardId} LIMIT 1

SELECT cc.*, u.korean_name AS created_by_name, c.company_name AS company_name FROM company_card_tb cc LEFT JOIN user_tb u ON cc.created_by = u.user_id LEFT JOIN company_tb c ON cc.company_id = c.company_id WHERE cc.company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY cc.created_at DESC
